headline: Plan to Cut U.S. Troops In West Africa Is Criticized
abstract: French officials said that a Pentagon proposal to relocate troops as it focuses on China and Russia could hinder the fight against extremists.
lead_paragraph: BRUSSELS â€” A Pentagon proposal to greatly reduce American forces in West Africa faced criticism from allies on Tuesday, with French officials arguing that removing United States intelligence assets in the region could stymie the fight against extremist groups.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
